Love this jacket( it’s cute, good quality, kept me warm and is as described. It’s true to size , definitely a must have.
LA CALIDAD DEL MATERIAL ES MUY MALA EN LA PRIMER LAVADA PERDIÓ EL COLOR Y SE DETERIRORÓ EL MATERIAL
Love the jacket. Size was perfect

This is not the same material as a typical letterman jacket.  It is 100% polyester, it has some stretch and it is very soft.  It is also cropped to sit a few inches above your waist.  It runs a little small, but the arms are not fitted, they are more loose/wider than most jackets, which is a plus.The letter is a typical iron on and the buttons are plastic snaps.A little pricey considering the materials, but it is cute and unique!This is perfect for my teenage werewolf costume!  Can't wait till Halloween!!
It fits perfectly.  I'm very happy with it
Mala calidad de materiales. El precio no concuerda con la calidad del artículo.
Jacket has some stretch to it. It fit perfectly.
Fue un regalo pero la persona quedó fascinada , la recomiendo sin duda
